bunderworld.name: Standoff
bunderworld.desc: Once, nearby telescopes listened for a message from the stars. Now, these silos contain our prepared response. 4-12 players.

chill.name: Narrows
chill.desc: Without cooling systems such as these, excess heat from the Ark's forges would render the construct uninhabitable. 2-8 players.

cyberdyne.name: The Pit
cyberdyne.desc: Software simulations are held in contempt by the veteran instructors who run these training facilities. 4-10 players.

deadlock.name: Highground
deadlock.desc: A relic of older conflicts, this base was reactivated after the New Mombasa Slipspace Event. 4-12 players.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.desc: Millennia of tending has produced trees as ancient as the Forerunner structures they have grown around. 2-6 players.

riverworld.name: Valhalla
riverworld.desc: The crew of V-398 barely survived their unplanned landing in this gorge...this curious gorge. 6-16 players.

s3d_avalanche.name: Diamondback
s3d_avalanche.desc: Hot winds blow over what should be a dead moon. A reminder of the power Forerunners once wielded. 6-16 players.

s3d_edge.name: Edge
s3d_edge.desc: The remote frontier world of Partition has provided this ancient databank with the safety of seclusion. 6-16 players.

s3d_reactor.name: Reactor
s3d_reactor.desc: Being constructed just prior to the Invasion, its builders had to evacuate before it was completed. 6-16 players.

s3d_turf.name: Icebox
s3d_turf.desc: Though they dominate on open terrain, many Scarabs have fallen victim to the narrow streets of Earth's cities. 4-10 players.

shrine.name: Sandtrap
shrine.desc: Although the Brute occupiers have been driven from this ancient structure, they left plenty to remember them by. 6-16 players

zanzibar.name: Last Resort
zanzibar.desc: Remote industrial sites like this one are routinely requisitioned and used as part of Spartan training exercises. 4-12 players.
